handoff.objective: Carry discovery decisions into architect-authoring to define implementation plan for global sidebar layout unification and active route state correctness.

directive.title: Global Layout Sidebar Unification and Active Route State Fix
directive.summary: Unify sidebar into one global layout-bound component inside the main container with shared fixed header, independent scroll regions, collapsible icon mode with unique icons, fixed sidebar footer, and deterministic single active-route highlighting.
goals: Use one global layout-bound sidebar across apps/web
Place sidebar inside main container next to content with shared fixed header
Constrain shell to viewport height with independent sidebar/content scrolling
Support collapsible icon-column sidebar with unique icons per item
Fix active-route highlighting so exactly one intended route is active
